SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.search.filter

Interface MatcherFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SearchParameterType
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface MatcherFactory
Factory interface for creating search filters for a specific search parameter type.

Each search parameter type (TOKEN, STRING, DATE, NUMBER) implements this interface to create the appropriate ElementMatcher for that type, validate modifiers, and handle FHIR type variations (e.g., Period vs DateTime for DATE).

This enables the Open/Closed Principle: new search parameter types can be added by implementing this interface without modifying existing code.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SearchFilter
    createFilter(String modifier, Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType fhirType)
    Creates a search filter for the given modifier and FHIR type.

  • Method Details

    • createFilter

      @Nonnull SearchFilter createFilter(@Nullable String modifier, @Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType fhirType)
      Creates a search filter for the given modifier and FHIR type.
      Parameters:
      modifier - the search modifier (e.g., "not", "exact"), or null for no modifier
      fhirType - the FHIR type of the element being searched
      Returns:
      a configured SearchFilter
      Throws:
      InvalidModifierException - if the modifier is not supported for this type
